name: Ogre's Den
description:
My entry for the 2020 Haunted PS1 Halloween Jam.

You have been captured by a man-eating Ogre! Oh no!

There's only one door out of this monster's den, but you must collect three keys the Ogre has scattered around his den to unlock it.

Use your trusty light rock to gauge how visible you are, but be wary, the Ogre sees well in the dark.

Avoid the Ogre and stay in the shadows, if he sees you, it will surely be your end.

Game is pretty short, but keys have different places they can spawn every time.

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Left Ctrl to Sneak

E to Interact

Esc to Pause

Please let me know if you run into any bugs. I only play tested on Windows 10, so I can only hope Linux and MacOS versions run okay.
